layout.singingstanza: O day of re -- sur -- rec -- tion, O day of joy and light, O seal of our re -- demp -- tion, Most beau -- ti -- ful, most bright: On thee the high and low -- ly, Bend -- ing be -- fore the throne, Sing "Ho -- ly, ho -- ly, ho -- ly," To the great Three in One.

lyrics.stanza: O day of resurrection, O day of joy and light, O seal of our redemption, Most beautiful, most bright: On thee the high and lowly, Bending before the throne, Sing "Holy, holy, holy," To the great Three in One.

Today on weary nations The heavenly manna falls! To holy convocations The silver trumpet calls, Where gospel light is glowing With pure and radiant beams, And living water flowing With soul-refreshing streams.

New graces ever gaining From this of days the best, We reach the rest remaining For people who are blest; To Holy Ghost be praises, To Father and to Son; The Church her voice upraises To Thee, blest Three in One.
